author: newsr.in
title: China Open: It's Novak Djokovic vs Rafael Nadal in today's final - newsR
text:
*Beijing:* Novak Djokovic brushed off David Ferrer 6-2, 6-3 on Saturday to reach the China Open final, where old rival Rafael Nadal stands between the Serb and a sixth title in Beijing.
*Rafael Nadal vs Novak Djokovic. Pics/AFP*
Top-ranked Djokovic suffered the inconvenience of having his service broken for the first time at ... Â»
